summary:
🏦 With over 3.5 years of experience in the financial sector, I have worked as a Controlling Expert, Financial Risk Consultant, and currently as a Banking Consultant at FiSer Consulting. Collaborating with large Western and Eastern European banks, insurers, and asset managers, my focus has been on financial risk-related projects, their profitability, and delivering change within the Financial Services Industry. Currently, my primary focus is on driving and delivering business transformation in banks.

👨‍🏫 As a Trainer, I have honed my skills in leading business trainings for universities and corporates, creating engaging training materials, writing and preparing case interviews, and developing valuable internal and external resources.

🏆 As a former business case competitor, I have achieved remarkable success, winning 6 gold, 7 silver, and 2 bronze medals in national and international competitions, and was honored with the best Case Solver title in Hungary in 2019.

👨‍🏫 My passion for teaching has led me to acquire 4 years of experience in university teaching, serving as a professor's undergraduate Teaching Assistant (also known as a demonstrator) and as a Seminar Leader.

👨‍🎓 I am a proud Financial Management MSc graduate from the prestigious Utrecht University (Academic Ranking of World Universities: 7th in the European Union and 52nd worldwide).

🎓 I hold a Finance and Accounting BSc from Corvinus University of Budapest, where I also completed an extracurricular program for advanced mathematical studies called Special Financial Mathematics (SPM), further enhancing my skill set.

profile_positions.description:
As a Banking Consultant at FiSer Consulting, I am responsible for designing structured approaches to delivering change within the Financial Services Industry. My role involves developing business by enriching the current customer base of FiSer and attracting new business through partnerships with technology suppliers to ensure delivery of strategic initiatives. I am also driving and delivering business transformation assignments with our clients while participating in strategy development and implementation to expand our firm.

My responsibilities are also staying up to date with the latest developments in data management and digital transformation and have a good understanding of all developments on regulatory, organizational, and IT innovation sides within the Financial Services Industry. I need to be collaborative, delivery-focused, and problem solver with experience in project/change management and business analytical skills across the full change management lifecycle within Agile working environments.
profile_positions.title: Banking Consultant

profile_positions.description:
For the last five years, we at Case Solvers have been using the case method to develop problem solving skills of students at the most prestigious business schools. To date, we have held trainings in 28 countries, educating more than 10,000 young talents around the world. We connect companies with top-tier students and also help train their employees in the latest problem solving skills.

As a trainer, occasionally I lead or co-lead problem solving and business trainings for universities and corporates, I develop training materials and present them on trainings, I write case interviews and case studies, last but not least prepare internal and also external materials.

Institutions, where I have held problem solving/case-solving trainings so far:

➤ University of Glasgow, Scotland
➤ BGE Budapest Business School, Hungary
➤ MCC College For Advanced Studies, Hungary
profile_positions.title: Trainer

profile_positions.description:
As a Financial Risk Management Consultant, I am part of the Financial Institutions team at Zanders, a team that focuses on financial risk-related projects for banks, insurers and asset managers with advising Zanders' clients surrounding their financial risk models, policies and governance.

Relevant Projects:
➤ Model validation of Energy and Climate Financial Model at a Dutch Bank
➤ Model development and support of Risk Report at a Dutch Asset Manager
➤ Model validation of Stressed Economic Value Equity at a large European Bank
➤ Model validation of Economic Value Equity at a large European Bank

Participating in the Zanders Talent Program to hone soft skills and content knowledge in cooperation with other young talents at Zanders
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description:
➤ Responsible for the profitability (Net Present Value) calculations for all the new disbursed banking instruments of the Bank’s 11 foreign subsidiaries in the Central-Eastern region with 10+ million customers

➤ Supporting management decisions by providing financial analysis based on the NPV
results for the International Product Development, Sales and Pricing Committee
(IPDSPC)
profile_positions.title: Controlling and Analysis Expert

profile_positions.description:
➤ Assisting in the process of Strategy, Planning and Controlling for the 9 foreign subsidiaries of OTP bank

➤ Helping in the pricing process of the new banking products

➤ Providing financial analysis of the Bank’s competitors in the foreign markets
profile_positions.title: Strategy, Planning and Controlling Intern

profile_positions.description:

   ➤ Introduction to Financial Modelling
   ➤ Business Economics
   ➤ Applied Business Economics
   ➤ Cases on Business Economics
   ➤ Cases in International Business Strategy
   ➤ International Business Project in cooperation with the University of North Carolina
profile_positions.title: Teaching Assistant

profile_positions.description: ➤ Due to the cooperation between Corvinus University of Budapest and a Big Four accounting firm the task was to provide detailed financial calculations according to the financial statements of 16 Premier League football clubs
profile_positions.title: Financial Analyst

volunteer_experiences.description:
➤Economie Combinatie Utrecht 1992 (ECU’92) is a study association for helping the students with a special interest and expertise in the field of Finance, Economics and Business Economics with organizing career days, inhouse days, workshops and connecting young talents with their future employers

My tasks as the Treasurer of the Community:
➤Role of the 'Money man' at Financial Master Community
➤Responsible for approving and forecasting budgets

➤An exclusive program designed for young professionals with high potential. At BCG talent is considered their ultimate asset and as such they are constantly building upon gifted students by nurturing and developing them

➤ The first student organization with 100% entrepreneurship focus that goal is to bring together the various expertise of pioneers in business, economics, engineering, programming and arts who are passionate about the world of entrepreneurship
➤SPM (in English: Special Financial Mathematics) is an extracurricular programme for advanced mathematical with higher-level courses in Statistics, Mathematics, Finance and Financial Modelling
